alert.note: Alert for Calcasieu (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 14 at 10:18AM CDT until May 15 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Lake Charles LA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Louisiana... Calcasieu River Near Salt Water Barrier Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Calcasieu River Near Salt Water Barrier. * WHEN...From this evening to tomorrow evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:00 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 4.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 5:00 AM CDT Sunday was 4.0 feet. - Forecast...The river will oscillate around flood stage with a maximum value of 4.0 feet this evening. - Flood stage is 4.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Calcasieu River Salt Water Barrie 4.0 4.0 Sun 5 am CDT 3.8 3.7 3.7 &&
